name: VAL_CD
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The VAL_CD table holds the value codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: VAL_CD
columns.description: This item holds the value codes that apply to the claim.

columns.name: VAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: This item holds the amount corresponding to the value code.
